ygData.subject: Re: Two of the same weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: If it was the case that there was only one Fiery Avenger... that is the correct name ... Then Veeshan would be screwed already as Aradune already wields this
ygData.messageBody:
If it was the case that there was only one Fiery Avenger... that is the correct
name ... Then Veeshan would be screwed already as Aradune already wields this
sword. It is one hand slashing, or at least it was in beta, and supposedly is a
paladin holy sword although aradune is a ranger so its interesting to see how he
runs about with it. It does look like a 2 handed sword, but so does the
Ghoulsbane, another onehanded holy sword.
Penaden Songweaver
The Lost Order of Akalabeth
http://www.lostorder.com

> > For roleplaying sake there should only be one of each unique monster and
> > weapon. Once you kill Dvinn or Crush, they should be dead and you get
> their

> > you.
> >
> > Bu this is a MMPORPG. You cannot restrict the monster or item to just one
> > person. Therefore he spawns again, giving someone else a chance to kill
> > him.
> >
> > The Lore Item is a way to restrict people from continuous camping. The
> idea
> > is that others would then have a chance to kill the monster and get the
> > weapon.
> >
> > Wayne
> >
> >
> >
> > > Date: Sat, 3 Jul 1999 14:10:12 -0700
> > > From: "Sean Kennedy" <orang@...>
> > > What's the big deal with people wanting 2 of the same item?
> > > Just from a game mechanics point of view, 2 items with differing
> > > delays are better. They get out of synch, and allow shorter
> > > windows for casters to get a spell off. Plus, I LIKE the way
> > > different weapon combo's look. <g>
